title: Great but half screen is disappearing in iPad
text:
I like the telegram app a lot. It is my favorite chat app. However, there is some big issue that keeps me from even typing in chat boxes. I am using iPad air 2. 

Here is the big problem: when I try to send message or write in a group, the chat history space(on the right) and the people/group list(on the left) is raised to give space for the keyboard. But when I am done writing and lower/hide the keyboard. Everything raised stays on the raised position (doesn‚Äôt return to original position). This leaves the place the keyboard previously taken to be empty. That means half of the bottom screen will always remains empty with only background color. The solution is only restarting telegram app and not typing any thing. This issue need to be fixed. I have waited for more than 10 updates. It is not solved yet. Please consider it seriously and I can help you with providing more info. I tried to send it to volunteer support in telegram, but I haven‚Äôt received any response. 

I look forward to your response and fixes about this bug.

title: Problemas con la Wallet
text:
Hasta ahora todo estaba bien y desde hace unos d√≠as tengo bloqueada mi Wallet con 350 usdt y 6 Ton y me dice que estoy en una regi√≥n que no brindan ese servicio. Por lo menos d√©jenme sacar ese dinero. Saludos Hace tiempo escrib√≠ de mi problema y no dan soluci√≥n, que confianza se puede tener en esta Wallet que de un d√≠a para otro inmoviliza mi dinero y interrumpe todos mis planes para con esta aplicaci√≥n. Until now everything was fine and for a few days I have had my Wallet blocked with 350 USD and 6 Ton and it tells me that I am in a region that does not provide that service. At least let me get that money. Greetings A long time ago I wrote about my problem and they don't provide a solution, how much trust can I have in this Wallet that from one day to the next immobilizes my money and interrupts all my plans for this aplicaci√≥n.
No entiendo con la publicidad que dan para que se use esta Wallet de Telegram y ahora me bloquean. Tendr√© que hacer publicidad para que todos sepan que pueden ser bloqueados

title: Love the app not the fake. Profiles
text:
I would pay to have a verified badge on Telegram where you would have to show a drivers Licence and face req to get this. This would eliminate plenty of fake profiles.

Other than that great app

title: Telegram
text: I was banned from this app, either you fix this app and let me put my number back on it or are you in trouble? Would you please fix this account now I need it fixed as soon as possible now.

title: My Telegram app is frozen
text: I‚Äôve used it for over a year and all of a sudden, it‚Äôs frozen. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled, I‚Äôve shut my phone down.  It seems to update, but I can‚Äôt open anything or scroll through.
